name: Band Members In Bands Quiz | Bands and Musical Acts | 10 Questions

questions.text: Tom Scholz and Brad Delp played for who?
Eric Clapton played in this band when he wrote 'Layla'
questions.correct: Derek And The Dominoes & Derek And The Dominos
questions.explanation: Derek And The Dominoes & Derek And The Dominos.

questions.text: Ace Frehley and Gene Simmons played for who?
Tim Mahoney and Chad Sexton play for who?
Randy Meisner played for what band?
Peter Griesner was the sixth member of this band before they were famous who is the band?
questions.correct: Dave Matthews Band & dave matthews band & DMB & dmb
questions.explanation: Dave Matthews Band & dave matthews band & DMB & dmb.

questions.text: Maceo was the famous sax player who played with?
Ken Block is the lead singer for this country-rock band. What band is it?
Jerry Cantrell And Layne Stanley are from what band?
questions.correct: Alice In Chains & alice in chains & AIC
questions.explanation: Alice In Chains & alice in chains & AIC.

questions.text: Mickey Hart and a keyboardist by the nickname of 'Pigpen' play for what band?
